_isEnabled.title: Is Enabled
_isEnabled.description: If enabled, the course will be tracked by xAPI.

_activityId.title: Activity ID
_activityId.description: Unique identifier for this xAPI activity. Used to populate the Activity ID included in _tincan.xml_ and for use in the Statement and State API. The value will be overriden if changed on the hosting environment.

_revision.title: Revision
_revision.description: This helps identify users running particular versions of the content, should functionality have been changed or issues found which require updates/voided statements for users running a specific revision. Where data has changed significantly, a new Activity ID is recommended.

_storeQuestionResponses.title: Store question responses
_storeQuestionResponses.description: If enabled, the course will store the user's question responses across sessions.

_questionInteractions.title: Record question responses
_questionInteractions.description: If enabled, the course will send statements recording the user's question responses.

_assessmentsCompletion.title: Record assessments completion
_assessmentsCompletion.description: If enabled, the course will send a statement for each assessment that is completed. Recommended only for courses containing multiple assessments.

_assessmentCompletion.title: Record assessment completion
_assessmentCompletion.description: If enabled, the course will send a statement when the assessment have been completed. If using multiple assessments, the statement will be sent when all assessments have been completed.

_navbar.title: Record navigation actions
_navbar.description: If enabled, the course will send statements when navigation buttons are clicked.

_visua11y.title: Record accessibility interactions
_visua11y.description: If enabled, the course will send statements for Visua11y accessibility interactions.

_connectionErrors.title: Record connection errors
_connectionErrors.description: If enabled, the course will send statements when LRS connection errors occur.

_inactivityTimout.title: Record inactivity timeout
_inactivityTimout.description: If enabled, the course will send statements when user inactivity timeout is detected.

_isRestoreEnabled.title: Enable state restoration
_isRestoreEnabled.description: If enabled, the course will attempt to restore learner progress from the LRS using the State API.

_isDebugModeEnabled.title: Enable debug mode
_isDebugModeEnabled.description: If enabled, the course will log detailed xAPI debug information to the console.

_offlineQueue.title: Offline Queue
_offlineQueue.description: Configure offline queueing for unreliable network connections.

_isEnabled.title: Enable offline queue
_isEnabled.description: If enabled, statements will be queued and retried when network connectivity is unreliable.

_threshold.title: Queue threshold
_threshold.description: Maximum number of statements to queue before triggering batch flush.

_timeout.title: Request timeout (ms)
_timeout.description: How long to wait for LRS response before timing out.

_maxRetries.title: Maximum retries
_maxRetries.description: How many times to retry failed statements before giving up.

_retryDelay.title: Retry delay (ms)
_retryDelay.description: How long to wait before retrying failed statements.

_isCancellable.title: Cancel notification
_isCancellable.description: If enabled, the user can close the notification and continue with an untracked session.
